altTitles.ja: ガラクシアス

description.en:
It's been ten years since the assassination of the Dragon King, the land's most powerful ruler. Off in the corner of the kingdom where tailed dragonfolk dwell, Jio, a human girl, yearns for adventure and an escape from rural life. However, when she meets the mysterious, amnesiac young man Neraid, Jio's life turns upside-down! With courage and curiosity knocking on the door, the two of them find the ultimate adventure waiting for them!! A traditional battle fantasy from a rookie artist begins!! (K MANGA)
___
[Official X Account](https://x.com/GALAXIAS_manga)
**Official English:** [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10608/episode/352898) - United States, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, & Singapore only.

title.en: "Monban Yattero" to Iware Juugo Nen, Tsuttatetteru Aida ni Ore no Maryoku ga 9999 "Saikyou" ni Sodattemashita

altTitles.ja: 「門番やってろ」と言われ15年、突っ立ってる間に俺の魔力が9999（最強）に育ってました

altTitles.ja-ro: "Monban Yattero" to Iware 15 Nen, Tsuttatetteru Aida ni Ore no Maryoku ga 9999 "Saikyou" ni Sodattemashita

altTitles.en: Being Told "Do Your Best" for 15 Years, My Magical Power Has Grown to 9999 "The Strongest"

description.en:
Although Royle is blessed with a good physique, he was told that he had no talent for fighting, and was forced to work as a lonely gatekeeper for 15 years. While he is working, all he can do is fantasize about the adventure stories in which he is the main character, and his job as gatekeeper is replaced by an “automatic surveillance interception magic tool” and he is laid off.
Loyle is at a loss, but on the way to another town, he meets the saint Diz. After meeting her, he discovers that the “strongest original magic” that he always used in his delusions can in fact be used in reality…
An exhilarating story about the strongest man with no communication skills and 9999 magic power who becomes an adventurer and becomes unrivaled!

altTitles.ja: 夜のまにまに

altTitles.fr: À la tombée de la nuit

description.en: Cheerful, energetic high school girl Chika and shy, reserved boy Waya couldn’t be more different. But they have a secret: every Wednesday after 9PM they meet outside the convenience store where Waya works. Bit by bit, under the light of the moon, a unique connection begins to blossom in this enchanting coming-of-age love story!
description.fr:
**À la tombée de la nuit** 

La joyeuse et énergique Chika, le timide et silencieux Waya. Ces deux-là, qui sont le jour et la nuit, discutent chaque mercredi soir devant une supérette. À la tombée de la nuit, il se rapproche peu à peu. Une histoire d'amour de jeunesse !
description.pt-br: Chika é uma garota alegre e divertida, Waya é um garoto tímido e gentil. Os dois opostos se falam apenas na loja de conveniência na quarta-feira. Uma história de amor juvenil onde eles diminuem a distância lentamente durante a noite!

altTitles.ja: 海辺のキュー

description.en:
"Why won't this city get destroyed…"   
Chiho, a middle school girl teased for not having a smartphone goes to the seaside to vent her anger, there she meets the strange creature, Q!! Chiho takes a liking to Q, who feeds off human's negative emotions, then decides to secretly bring back and adopt Q, what mysteries does Q hold…?   
Thus begins, in the port city of Numazu, the "invader life" of Chiho and Q.

altTitles.ja: マンダリン・ジプシーキャットの籠城

description.en: Somewhere, in Asia, in the future... For several years now, men have hardly been born. The latter are often reduced to their role of reproductive partner. Society is built around a matriarchal system. Neither wars nor conflicts disturb the daily life and the balance. But some have decided to flee the city. They settled outside, in a slum. This is where Sanada resides. Sanada has a secret... a secret that could well stir up the lust of her fellows.
description.es: En algún lugar de Asia, en el futuro... Desde hace varios años, casi no nacen hombres. Los hombres suelen quedar reducidos al papel de pareja reproductora y la sociedad se ha construido en torno a un sistema matriarcal. Ni las guerras ni los conflictos perturban la vida cotidiana y el equilibrio. Pero algunos de ellos han decidido huir de la ciudad. Se instalaron en las afueras, en un poblado de chabolas. Aquí es donde vive Sanada. Tiene un secreto... un secreto que bien podría atraer la codicia de sus congéneres.

description.de:
Damals hatte Dokja noch überhaupt keine Ahnung. Er hatte keine Ahnung, dass sein Lieblings-Web-Roman ‘Drei Wege um die Apokalypse zu überleben’ Realität wird und dass er der einzige ist, der weiß wie der Weltuntergang aussehen wird. Er hatte auch keine Ahnung, dass er letztendlich der Protagonist von diesem Roman werden würde. Jetzt begibt sich Dokja auf eine Reise, um den Lauf der Geschichte zu ändern und die Menschheit zu retten!

description.en: Dokja was an average office worker whose sole interest was reading his favorite web novel 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' But when the novel suddenly becomes reality, he is the only person who knows how the world will end. Armed with this realization, Dokja uses his understanding to change the course of the story, and the world, as he knows it.
description.es:
En ese entonces, Dokja no tenía idea de que su novela web favorita, Tres maneras de sobrevivir al apocalipsis, cobraría vida y que solo él sabría cómo iba a terminar el mundo. Tampoco tenía idea de que se convertiría en el protagonista de esta novela transformada en realidad. Ahora Dokja debe embarcarse en un viaje para alterar el curso de la historia y salvar a la humanidad de una vez por todas.

description.ja:
「ありえない...これは俺が知っている展開だ。」 10年以上読み続けた小説の最終話を読んだ日、世界は滅亡し小説の世界が現実となった。 平凡で冴えないサラリーマンの主人公・ドクシャ。 そんな彼の趣味はWEB小説『滅亡した世界で生き残る３つの方法』を読むこと。 ついに最終話を読み終えたかと思いきや、作者からのメッセージが届き小説のモンスターと登場人物が突如現れ、新たな世界が幕を開けた！ 「俺は、この世界の結末を知る唯一の読者となった。」 たった一人だけが読み終えたファンタジー小説が現実に。 果たしてドクシャは滅亡した世界を救うことができるのか？

altTitles.ja: ガールズゾンビパーティー

description.en: An extreme survival story of girls in a world where half of humanity has turned into monstrous beings!  That day, Sayo Mitsurugi wasn’t focused on her lessons, due to staying up late the previous night.  During the lunch break, she was talking on the phone with her hospitalized younger brother, and up until that moment, everything was part of her usual routine.  But then. Suddenly, the signal cut off, and the phone call ended. From that moment on, hell began!  Due to the influence of zombies that appeared in the school, the men began to transform into monstrous beings one after another.  By chance, Saya teams up with her classmates, the angelic Maria and Momo, to attempt an escape from this hell!
description.ja:
御剣サヤはその日、夜更かしの影響もあって、授業に身が入っていなかった。昼休み、入院中の弟と電話するなど、その時はまでは、変わらない日常だった。

だが。突然電波が途絶えて、電話が切れた。その瞬間から、地獄が始まった！

校内にやってきたゾンビの影響か次々と男たちが異形に変わる。

成り行き、クラスメイトの天使マリアと百城モモとチームを組んで、この地獄からの脱出を図る！

altTitles.pt-br: Convento de Monstros: Ordem Signiana de Missa

altTitles.la: Conventus Monstrorum: Ordo Signae de Missa

altTitles.en: Monsters' Convent: Signian Order of Missa

description.en: Gags of a Catholic Convent on a Fantasy World.
description.pt-br: Tirinhas sobre um Convento Católico num mundo de fantasia.

altTitles.ja: 忍者と殺し屋のふたりぐらし

altTitles.en: A Ninja and an Assassin Living Together

description.en: Many fatalities?! A naive female ninja and a high school assassin live together in an unpredictable way! A naive female ninja who escapes from a ninja village meets a high school girl assassin!? Their life together, which begins by chance, is full of danger (and excitement)...!
description.ja: 忍びの里から抜け出した世間知らずのくノ一が出会ったのは、女子高生の殺し屋!? ひょんなことから始まった共同生活は危険（ドキドキ）がいっぱい…！
description.ru:
Наивная куноити сбегает из своей деревни ниндзя и встречает школьницу-убийцу!
Начинается непредсказуемая совместная жизнь ниндзя и убийцы★.

altTitles.ja: わたしの工口先生

description.en:
Kouguchi Ruri, a skilled yet socially awkward male manga artist, has built a career creating niche "loli" manga. His carefully structured life takes a chaotic turn when Shiina Karen, an energetic young woman claiming to be a university student, joins him as his assistant.

 While Karen appears eager to learn, she harbors a mysterious secret and ulterior motives for working with Kouguchi. As they navigate the creative challenges of manga production, their quirky relationship evolves, blending humor, tension, and unexpected revelations.

 This workplace romantic comedy dives into the challenges of collaboration, personal growth, and the surprising connections that emerge in the unlikeliest of circumstances.

altTitles.ja: 救済系Vッタラー✟メシアちゃん

description.en: A horror manga where viewers watch and join in on Messiah-chan's stream activities.

title.en: Subete no Jinrui o Hakai Suru. Sorera wa Saisei Dekinai.

altTitles.ja: すべての人類を破壊する。それらは再生できない。

altTitles.ja-ro: Subete no Jinrui wo Hakai Suru. Sorera ha Saisei Dekinai.

altTitles.ja: Destroy all humankind. They can't be regenerated.

altTitles.en: Destroy All Humans. They Can’t Be Regenerated. A Magic: The Gathering Manga
Destroy All Humankind. They Can't Be Regenerated.
Destroy All of Humanity. It Can't Be Regenerated.

altTitles.es-la: Destruye a toda la humanidad. Ellos no pueden regenerarse.

altTitles.ru: Уничтожите всё человечество. Оно не может быть регенерировано.

altTitles.pt-br: Destrua Toda a Humanidade. Eles Não Podem Ser Regenerados.

description.en: This “youth graffiti” manga centers on two people in the 1990s who play the Magic the Gathering trading card game.
description.es-la: El manga de "youth graffiti" se centra en dos personas de los años 90 que juegan al juego de cartas coleccionables Magic the Gathering.
description.pt-br:
Julho de 1999, o mês em que o mundo será destruído segundo Nostradamus. O estudante do fundamental, chamado Hajime, sempre fica atrás de sua rival, a bela Sawatari. Ela não o considera como seu rival, após de ter se introduzido como tal. Ele também é um avido jogador de "Magic: The Gathering". Enquanto ele procura novas cartas ele descobre que a Sawatari também joga MTG, mas escondida. Ela foge após reconhecer ele durante uma partida do card game. No dia seguinte ele desafia ela para um duelo, com um deck especial criado para ganhar dela, prometendo ficar falado e fazer qualquer coisa que ela desejar caso perca. Uma coisa leva a outra e eles finalmente se tornam amigos. Que no fim ele lembra que este era seu objetivo inicial. 

| O título do manga é um trocadilho com a descrição da carta "Cólera de Deus" que é "Destrua todas as criaturas. Elas não podem ser regeneradas." |

description.en: Sayeon Lee despises Aberrants. They wreak havoc on society with their strange, unthinkable powers. It's just too bad she happens to be an Aberrant herself! Forced to fend for her life in the deadly Aberrant Corps, she's determined to make it to the top, and her unusual ability should help her -- if she can figure out how to use it in time.

altTitles.ja: 色憑くモノクローム

description.en:
Isshiki falls in love with a maiden who is pure and innocent, but he has been possessed by Asmodeus, the demon of lust. The demon tries to arouse Isshiki by stimulating the sexual desires of the girls around him in every possible way. However, in order to exorcise the demon and avoid the girls' suspicions, Isshiki must never get excited, no matter how lewd they may act!

"How can I stand this...!"
description.ja: 純潔を貫く乙女に恋をした主人公・一色は、よりにもよって色欲の悪魔アスモデウスに憑りつかれてしまった。悪魔はあの手この手で乙女たちの性欲を刺激して一色を興奮させようとしてくる。しかし、乙女に嫌われないためにも悪魔を祓うためにも一色は絶対に興奮してはならない……たとえそれがどんなに淫らな行為だとしても！「こんなの我慢できるわけ……っ！」エロスとピュア、究極のせめぎ合いラブコメ開戦！

title.en: Suterare Elf-san wa Sekai de Ichiban Tsuyokute Kawaii!

altTitles.ja: 捨てられエルフさん は世界で一番強くて可愛い！

altTitles.en: The Abandoned Elf is the Strongest and Cutest in the World!

altTitles.hu: A magára hagyott elf lány a világ legerősebb és legaranyosabbja!

description.en:
"Dear top players, this game is a real parallel world. If you reincarnate and save the world, any wish you have will be granted."

Former popular voice actress Ayano responded to the proposal from the goddess. In order to shine as a voice actress once again. Reincarnated as the strongest species of high elf, she aims to "clear the game" in the parallel world with the strongest and cutest kemo-eared heroine using her gaming knowledge, but –!?
description.hu:
**【Egykori toplistás játékos】+【Játékvilág】= Szuper verhetetlen!? Folytatom az életet a legerősebb énemmel!!**

„Kedves top játékosok! Ez a játék egy valós párhuzamos világ. Ha újjászülettek és megmentitek a világot, bármilyen kívánságotokat teljesítjük.”

Erre az istennő ajánlatára válaszolt Ayano, egykori népszerű szinkronszínész. Azért, hogy ismét ragyoghasson szinkronszínészként, a legerősebb faj, a nemes elf egyikeként született újjá. Most, a legerősebb és legaranyosabb állatfüles hősnővel karöltve, játékbeli tudását felhasználva célja a párhuzamos világban a „játék végigjátszása” - de vajon sikerül-e neki!?
description.ja:
「トッププレイヤーの皆様。このゲームは実在する異世界です。転生し、世界を救えばどんな願いも叶えてあげましょう」

女神からの提案に、元人気声優のアヤノは応えた。炎上して干された今、もう一度声優として輝くために。炎上後にゲームをやり込みトップランカーとなったアヤノは、その知識を生かして、最強種【ハイエルフ】に転生! 最強可愛いケモ耳ヒロイン・ホムラとともに異世界での“ゲームクリア”を目指すが、この世界はただの「ゲーム世界」ではないようで――!?

title.en: Guild no Uketsukejou Desu ga, Zangyou wa Iya Nanode Boss wo Solo Toubatsu Shiyou to Omoimasu

altTitles.ja: ギルドの受付嬢ですが、残業は嫌なのでボスをソロ討伐しようと思います

altTitles.en: I May Be a Guild Receptionist, but I'll Solo Any Boss to Clock Out on Time

altTitles.zh: 虽然是公会柜台小姐，但是因为讨厌加班所以要去单挑BOSS

altTitles.en: I'm The Guild Receptionist, But Since I Don't Want To Work Overtime, I Think I'll Just Solo The Boss

description.en:
"It's safe because it's a desk job, super stable because it's public work!"

Alina Clover thought being a receptionist for the Adventurers Guild would be her ticket to the good life... but her dream gig turns into an overtime nightmare whenever adventurers get stuck clearing a dungeon. To save herself from paperwork, Alina turns to the simplest solution at hand — beating down the monsters herself! A mysterious adventurer showing up out of nowhere, soloing the boss, then disappearing without taking credit is bound to create rumors, and Alina's treasured job forbids side hustles. So there might be trouble when the leader of the Silver Sword party discovers her secret...!
description.ja:
内勤だから安全、公務だから超安定！

そんな理想の職業「ギルドの受付嬢」となったアリナを待っていたのは、理想とは程遠い残業三昧の日々だった。

全てはダンジョンの攻略が滞っているせい！ 限界を迎えたアリナは、なんと大鎚を手に自らボス討伐に赴くのであった―。

title.en: I Really Don't Want to Be Reborn

altTitles.en: I Really Don't Want to Remake

altTitles.vi: Ta Không Muốn Trùng Sinh Đâu

description.en:
Little had I known, I Chen Hansheng; the former elite of society and a Diamond Bachelor, was reborn. When I woke up, I was a senior graduate in high school? 
Later, Chen Hansheng was walking near the crosswalk, he seemed hesitant. A precious girl; Shen Youchu and two other girls; Bai Yueguang and Xiao Rongyu, who will he pick? All of them? One of them? Two of them? Read to find out. 

Side Note:  Diamond Bachelor is a slang word that means someone who’s insanely rich and single.

altTitles.ja: アイツノカノジョ

altTitles.fr: La petite amie de ce mec

description.en: It's April of my third and final year in high school... But the beautiful girl I have a crush on is my best friend's girlfriend. Thus begins my year of treading on the dangerous ground...
description.ja:
気になるあの娘は、”親友の”彼女。

始まりの季節、春。主人公・リクの家を訪れた美少女・雫は「いいよ、何しても。」と、リクを誘う。しかし雫は、“親友（アイツ）の彼女”。
description.pt-br: É abril do meu terceiro e último ano no ensino médio... Mas a linda garota por quem tenho uma queda é a namorada do meu melhor amigo. Assim começa meu ano pisando em um terreno perigoso...

title.en: Houkago, Family Restaurant de, Class no Ano Ko to

altTitles.vi: Sau giờ học, tại nhà hàng gia đình, cùng cô bạn cùng lớp

altTitles.ja: 放課後、ファミレスで、クラスのあの子と。

altTitles.en: After School, at a Family Restaurant at Night, With That Girl From My Class

altTitles.pt-br: Depois da escola, em um restaurante familiar à noite, com aquela garota da minha turma

altTitles.id: Setelah Sekolah, di Restoran Keluarga Malam Hari, Bersama Cewek Teman Sekelasku

description.en:
It's kind of fun, and I'm comfortable with that kind of time.

The family restaurant after school is the only place where I can feel at ease, as I have no place at home due to my parents' remarriage.
At the family restaurant, I meet a classmate, Kazemiya Kohaku, who is a solitary beautiful girl who doesn't fit in with anyone.
She also seems to be having problems with her family.

From that day on, the boring time at the family restaurant became an enjoyable time to complain with Kohaku.
At the family restaurant after school, the two of them begin their search for a reason not to return home again today...
description.ja:
なんとなく楽しい、そんな時間が心地よくて。

放課後のファミレス、そこは親の再婚で家に居場所がない俺にとって、唯一気が休まる大切な居場所。
そんなファミレスで出会ったクラスメイトの加瀬宮小白は、誰とも馴染まない孤高の美少女。
聞けば彼女も家族との問題を抱えているらしい。

その日から、退屈だったファミレスでの時間は小白と愚痴り合う楽しい時間になった。
放課後のファミレスで、今日もふたりの帰らない理…
description.pt-br: É divertido e me sinto confortável com esse tipo de tempo. O restaurante familiar depois da escola é o único lugar onde posso me sentir à vontade, pois não tenho lugar em casa devido ao novo casamento dos meus pais. No restaurante da família, conheço uma colega de classe, Kazemiya Kohaku, que é uma linda garota solitária que não se dá bem com ninguém. Ela também parece estar tendo problemas com sua família. Daquele dia em diante, o tempo chato no restaurante da família tornou-se um momento agradável para reclamar com Kohaku. No restaurante da família, depois da escola, os dois começam a procurar um motivo para não voltarem para casa hoje...

altTitles.ja: 赤羽骨子のボディガード

description.en:
Honeko Akabane is an ordinary high school girl. The daughter of a lawyer, she seeks to just live a regular life - even if that means chiding her childhood friend, the ever-violent Ibuki Arakuni, whenever he gets into fights with random people. 

However, Ibuki holds a secret only he knows - Honeko was adopted by her current parents, and is actually the illegitimate daughter of a yakuza bigwig. As it turns out, the boss is retiring, and many people in his gang are looking to take his place; since Honeko is his heir, they want to kill her to clean up any loose ends. 

And so Ibuki must protect Honeko from a variety of criminals, without letting her know about her true lineage. Can he act as her bodyguard while simultaneously keeping her unaware of her situation?
description.ja:
奴らの狙いはただひとつ、赤羽骨子を殺すこと――。

錚々児高校3年4組・威吹荒邦はある日、クラスメイトで幼馴染の赤羽骨子が殺し屋から命を狙われていることを知る。そして彼に託された使命は、赤羽に知られることなく1年間守り抜き、無事に高校を卒業させること。こうして秘密のボディガード学園生活が始まった！しかし「3年4組」にはさらなる秘密があって……!?

title.en: Yumizuka Iroha wa Tejun ga Daiji!

altTitles.en: Technique Is Everything to Yumizuka Iroha!
The Process Is Important for Iroha Yumizuka
Yumizuka Iroha's No Good Without Her Procedure!

altTitles.ja: 弓塚いろはは手順が大事！

altTitles.zh: 弓塚同学今天也依旧脱靶

description.en: Yumizuka-san grew up as the daughter of one of Japan's leading families of archery. But she had a secret about her seemingly perfect life! A tempestuous romantic comedy about a captivating archer!

The series is a new band story following a young man who sets off on a music journey when his soul is set aflame after discovering a guitar


Source:ANN

title.en: The Reincarnated Assassin Is a Swordmaster

altTitles.es-la: El asesino reencarnado es un genio de la espada

altTitles.en: The Reincarnated Assassin is a Genius Swordsman

description.en:
Raon was once a loyal assassin for House Robert until Derus killed him. Not willing to give up, Raon prayed for vengeance and woke as a member of House Sieghart, the most powerful noble house!

He’ll need all of their near-infinite resources to get revenge. Though he carried over knowledge of a powerful Flame Link technique, he also carries the Curse of Bitter Frost, something that’s slowly killing him.

As if that weren’t enough, the demonic embodiment of Wrath is trying to take over his body!?
description.zh:
拉昂的一生就像一条拴着锁链的狗。
然而，造化弄人，他获得了新生
--即使他的怒火依然留在断裂的锁链之中。
终于能够自立，他决定按照自己的意愿生活。
“我会杀死一切阻挡我的人，神也不例外。”

description.en:
Qiao An, a student from the Battle Armor Academy’s elite class, failed the battle armor qualification test and was downgraded to the outer department's logistics class. In the post-apocalyptic world, three centuries after the fall of humanity, Qiao An, burdened with massive debt, unexpectedly discovers that he has already formed contracts with not just one, but multiple top-tier battle armors.




"Black or white, which do you choose?"

"I want both!"




With the strongest battle armors, making money becomes a piece of cake.

"Save the world? Not interested, doesn't concern me."

"What? All my debts cleared? Hey, wait a minute!"

altTitles.ja: ブレス

description.en: Young Aya Udagawa has already managed to work as a model, but at one time he abandoned the dream of making a career as a makeup artist because of fears of being rejected by others. One day, he decides to help out the nondescript Sumizaki and does her make-up to participate in the school competition. Aya feels that Sumizaki has a hidden charm and charisma and needs only to help the girl prove herself.
description.ja: 元モデルの宇田川アイアは、メイクアップアーティストになる夢を持っていたが、周りから否定されることを恐れて夢を諦めていた。ある日アイアは、顔のそばかすを隠すように背中を丸めている大人しい女の子・炭崎純と学園祭のコンテストに出場することになった。衣装・ヘアメイクを担当するスタイリスト役とモデル役の2人1組でランウェイを歩くコンテストで、アイアは炭崎にメイクをすることに。炭崎とのやり取りの中で教室では見せない魅力を炭崎に感じたアイアは、メイクで炭崎の魅力を引き出し学園祭に挑む。
description.ru: Юный Айа Удагава уже успел поработать моделью, но в своё время отказался от мечты сделать карьёру визажиста из-за опасений быть непринятым окружающими. Однажды он решает выручить невзрачную Сумидзаки и делает ей макияж для участия в школьном конкурсе. Айа чувствует, что Сумидзаки обладает скрытым шармом и харизмой и нужно лишь помочь девушке проявить себя.
description.vi:
Khi còn là học sinh cấp 2, Udagawa Aia đã được tuyển chọn làm người mẫu nhưng thực tế, nguyện vọng của cậu là muốn trở thành một thợ trang điểm chuyên nghiệp. Và Sumisaki Jun, một gái trầm tính với dáng vẻ khom lưng xấu hổ vì những vết tàn nhang trên mặt, lại khao khát muốn trở thành người mẫu.
Một ngày nọ, cả hai bị buộc phải bắt cặp với nhau để tham dự cuộc thi nghệ thuật tại trường trung học Aoi. Hai con người chưa từng bộc lộ mong muốn thật sự của mình cho ai khác, cũng chưa từng dám thử đối mặt với thách thức để theo đuổi đam mê, nay lại cùng nhau tạo nên một đội đáng gờm. Cả hai đã khám phá ra được mong muốn thật sự của đối phương lẫn việc bản thân không thể chối bỏ đam mê của mình, với niềm khao khát mãnh liệt, Aia và Jun đã bùng nổ rực rỡ.
description.pt-br: O Ex-modelo Udagawa Aia tinha o sonho de se tornar maquiador, mas desistiu porque tinha medo da negação que outros podiam demonstrar. Um dia, decidido que ele tinha que participar de um concurso do festival escolar com uma garota pouco atraente, Sumisaki e então decide maquiá-la.

altTitles.ja: ガールズ＆パンツァー リトルアーミー

description.en:
In the world, the manipulation of tanks (Sensha-do) is one of the traditional martial arts especially for girls. Miho doesn't like Sensha-do and moves to Oarai Girl's High School. But the chairperson of the student council orders Miho to participate in the national Sensha-do championship.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2015)
description.pl: Na świecie operacja czołgami (Sensha-do) jest jedną z tradycyjnych sztuk walki, szczególnie dla dziewcząt. Miho nie lubi Sensha-do i przenosi się do liceum Oarai Girl's High School. Jednak Przewodnicząca Samorządu Uczniowskiego nakazuje Miho wziąć udział w krajowych mistrzostwach Sensha-do.---Oficjalne wydanie:- Wydanie indonezyjskie przez Elex Media (2015)

description.en: Initially, Li Li only wanted to sleep with his roommate once, so he could get some money to help his family. But he didn’t expect that before the ‘crime’ could be committed, he would be caught red-handed by his roommate’s older brother, Yan Wen, who got evidence and warned him to stay away from his younger brother. Li Li thought Yan Wen hated him, but when he had no one else to rely on, it was Yan Wen who offered a helping hand. A contract of support then changed the two’s relationship forever…

altTitles.ja: はんどすたんど！

description.en: The story of the girls in the gymnastics club unfolds at a certain high school in Hokkaido! There's the overly serious club president Yuka, the hopeless at sports Ichigo, the overly negative Hinata and the short with weird mannerisms Nanami. A gymnastics club 4-koma that will have you laughing every second, drawn by the up-and-coming Arima, begins now!
description.ja: とある北海道の高校で繰り広げられる、体操部の女の子たちの物語！真面目が過ぎる部長のゆか、運動が出来なさ過ぎるいちご、ネガティブ過ぎるひなた、ちんちくりんで言動が特徴的過ぎるななみ。新進気鋭の有馬が描く、毎秒笑える体操部４コマ、開幕です！

title.en: Tou no Kanri o Shite Miyou

altTitles.ja: 塔の管理をしてみよう

altTitles.ja-ro: Tou no Kanri wo Shite Miyou

altTitles.ru: Получается, я теперь в ответе за башню

altTitles.vi: Isekai làm người quản lý tháp

description.en: Kosuke is killed by a truck, his soul is lost in a garden with two beautiful girls. The owner of the place will let him choose whether he will be reborn or summoned to another world, and he maintains the summons. In this new world, the main two girls who were created by the owner of the garden to help him find the mystery behind the world - a Dungeon tower. Will he be able to become the owner of this tower and manage it?
description.ja: 仕事帰りに交通事故に遭ったことから魂が別世界に飛ばされてしまった考助。彼は保護してくれた女神の助力により、これまでの記憶を持ったまま新しい世界で生きていくことに。さらに女神が創造してくれたという、チートな能力と天使のような羽を持つ最強美女ふたりをお供に、新たな生を送ることになったのですが――。
description.es-la: Kosuke es atropellado por un camión mientras regresaba del trabajo. En ese momento, mientras su vida terminaba, su alma fue transferida al "Jardín de la eterna primavera" donde lo esperaba una hermosa mujer. Ella inmediatamente lo lleva con la diosa suprema, encargada de dicho mundo. La diosa suprema le permitirá elegir entre poder entrar al ciclo de la encarnación y renacer para empezar una nueva vida o ser invocado a otro mundo, de lo cual él elige ser invocado. La diosa suprema antes de transferirlo a este nuevo mundo le otorga una habilidad divina y dos bellas y poderosas sirvientes. En este nuevo mundo, las dos chicas principales que fueron creadas por la diosa del jardín le ayudarán a encontrar el misterio detrás del mundo: una torre de mazmorra. ¿Podrá convertirse en el dueño de esta torre y administrarla?

title.en: The Too-Perfect Saint: Tossed Aside by My Fiancé and Sold to Another Kingdom

altTitles.ja: 完璧すぎて可愛げがないと婚約破棄された聖女は隣国に売られる

altTitles.ja-ro: Kanpeki Sugite Kawaigeganai to Konyaku Hakisareta Seijo wa Ringoku ni Urareru

altTitles.en: The Saint Whose Engagement Was Broken When She Became Too Perfect Is Sold off to a Neighboring Kingdom

altTitles.th: เพราะสมบูรณ์แบบจนไม่น่ารัก สตรีศักดิ์สิทธิ์จึงถูกถอนหมั้นและขายไปอาณาจักรข้างเคียง

altTitles.ja-ro: Kanpeki Sugite Kawaige ga nai to Konyaku Hakisareta Seijo wa Ringoku ni Urareru

description.en:
Born into a family of saints, Philia’s childhood was filled with harsh education. Nevertheless, it formed her into a great saint and secured her engagement with the second Prince, Julius. But when she became too perfect and thus not cute in his eyes, Julius broke their engagement! That's why he decided to make her leave her homeland and make her a saint for a neighboring kingdom in exchange for money and resources. Philia was prepared to be treated miserably but what awaited her was an unexpected welcome!

Confused by her new circumstances, she began to use her powers to help solve the citizens' problems such as creating a barrier against monsters and creating a cure for the illness that wreaked havoc on the land. With her new found position, Philia recollected her memories of being in a novel and the future outbreak of monsters that was to come. She used her knowledge and with the help of the people, they quickly dealt with the problem! But at the same time, the very same country that sold her off was also in danger-?!
description.ja: “聖女”を代々輩出する家系に生まれたフィリアは、幼少からのスパルタ教育により「歴代最高の聖女」と評される程の実力を身につけ、完璧に仕事をこなしていた。だが、あまりの隙のなさに「完璧すぎて可愛げがない」と腫れ物のように扱われ、婚約者の第二王子ユリウスからも婚約破棄をされてしまう――。さらに“聖女”が不在のため苦しむ隣国との取引でフィリアは、莫大な金を対価に売られることに。隣国での悲惨な扱いを覚悟するフィリアだったが、待っていたのは予想外の大歓迎で……!?
description.pt-br: A família de Philia vem produzindo santos por gerações. Não é nenhuma surpresa que ela seja conhecida como a maior santa de todos os tempos e esteja prestes a se casar com o segundo príncipe, Julius. O que ninguém espera é que Julius cancele o noivado, alegando que a perfeição de Philia a torna sem charme e antipática. Para piorar a situação, Philia é enviada para um país vizinho em troca de ouro e recursos, forçando-a a deixar sua terra natal! Apesar de se preparar para maus-tratos, Philia encontra uma recepção calorosa em sua nova cidade, onde ela faz bom uso de suas habilidades santas, erguendo barreiras contra monstros e curando epidemias. Mas enquanto ela floresce em sua nova vida, sua terra natal está sob ameaça de destruição!

altTitles.ja: あそこではたらくムスブさん

altTitles.th: คุณมุสุบุกับงานของเธอ

description.en: Sagami Gorou works in sales at Shounan Rubber Industries Co., Ltd. He is secretly harboring feelings for Musubu, a girl working in the company's integrated development department. And what this lovely young scientist is researching day and night are actually…
description.es-la: La historia sigue a Sagami Gouro de 24 años que empieza a trabajar en Industria Shounan Gum S.A, allí conocerá a la investigadora Musubu-san una chica que trabaja en el laboratorio de desarrollo de asistencia médica la "casa", su primer encuentro no será precisamente el esperado.
description.pt-br: Sagami Gorou trabalha no setor de vendas da Indústria de Borracha Shounan Ltda e tem guardado seus sentimentos por Musubu, uma garota que trabalha no departamento de desenvolvimento integrado, em segredo. O objeto de estudo desta adorável cientista, na verdade é…

altTitles.ja: 双影双書

description.en: Shou, a young boy living in the red light district is suddenly taken to live in the imperial palace. He was selected to become the prince's shadow and act as his shield. In the palace where conspiracies swirl will Shou be able to protect himself and the prince?
description.ja: 遊郭生まれの孤児・宵はある日＂影武者＂として王宮に召し抱えられ、自分と同じ顔のワガママな皇太子・冠星に振り回される毎日を過ごすことに。だが、冠星の不遜な態度の裏には誰にも言えない＂孤独＂と＂使命＂があったーー
description.zh: 在花街柳巷看人脸色吃饭的少年・宵某天突然被皇宫收留。原因是他被选为了皇子那盾牌一般存在的「替身侍卫」，在阴谋重重的皇宫中，宵是否能保卫皇子的安全呢——⁉两名相貌如出一辙的少年相遇后，历史自此发生了巨变‼

altTitles.ja: 恋より青く

description.en:
Takamine, who can't find anything she likes, and Sakikura, who loves books. The two girls meet by chance and spend their after-school hours together. Are they friends? Or is it a nameless relationship spun between the two girls?

------------
Note: Serialization of the oneshot of same title by Fukaumi Kon in COMIC Ogyaaa!! published by Homesha.
description.ja: 好きなことが見つけられず、放課後を持て余す女子高生・高峯。ある日、電車内で落とした本を取り違えたことから読書好きの他校の生徒・咲倉と出会う。「本」を介した放課後のみの不思議な交流の中、高峯と咲倉はお互いに惹かれ始めていき――。友情でも恋愛でもない、ふたりだけの名前のない関係性を育む少女たちの青い春――。

altTitles.ja: リ・モンスター

altTitles.th: Re:Monster ราชันชาติอสูร

description.en: Tomokui Kanata has been reincarnated into the weakest race, goblin, and given a new name, Gobrou, after having undergone an unfortunate death. However, Gobrou has retained his previous life's memories and ability to learn skills from what he eats. In this alternate world of survival of the fittest, events unfold. Will a goblin party become the heroes of this world, in a delightful twist from your usual scenario?
description.ja: 前世で不運な死を遂げ、目覚めると最弱ゴブリンに転生していたゴブ朗。しかし、喰えば喰うほど強くなる【吸喰能力】で異常な進化を遂げ、あっという間にゴブリン・コミュニティのトップに君臨！
description.pt-br: Tomokui Kanata reincarnou na raça mais fraca, a dos goblins e ganhou um novo nome, Rou, após ter morrido de forma infeliz. Entretanto, o goblin Rou preservou as lembranças de sua vida passada, ganhando uma evolução incomum, mas mantendo sua capacidade de ganhar habilidades por comê-los. Neste mundo alternativo de sobrevivência do mais forte, com o desenrolar dos acontecimentos, irá o grupo do goblins se tornarem os heróis deste mundo e o transformarem em um cenário totalmente diferente do habitual? Ele irá se tornar o herói deste mundo ou um soberano das trevas dominará a todos?

altTitles.ja: 鵺の陰陽師

description.en: Yajima has been able to see spirits since he was small. At his new school is a room that nobody else can see. And inside is a spirit who loves playing video games.
description.fr: Yajima est capable de voir les esprits depuis qu'il est tout petit. Dans sa nouvelle école, il y a une pièce que personne d'autre ne peut voir. Et à l'intérieur se trouve un esprit qui aime jouer aux jeux vidéo. Une nouvelle saga d'exorcistes modernes commence !
description.ja: 幼少の頃から「幻妖」と呼ばれる存在が見えた少年・夜島学郎。高校入学初日、ひょんなことから出会ったサブカル好きの幻妖「鵺」に校内の幻妖退治を依頼されるが――…？
description.vi: Yajima đã có thể nhìn thấy các linh hồn từ khi còn nhỏ. Tại ngôi trường mới của cậu ấy có một căn phòng mà không ai khác có thể nhìn thấy. Và bên trong là một linh hồn thích chơi trò chơi điện tử. Một câu chuyện trừ tà hiện đại bắt đầu từ giây phút này!
description.pt-br: Yajima é capaz de enxergar Espíritos desde pequeno. Em sua nova escola há uma sala que mais ninguém consegue ver. E dentro dela mora uma Espírito que ama jogar videogames. Uma nova saga moderna de exorcistas começa agora!

altTitles.ja: ドラマクイン

description.en: After saving Earth, aliens have taken up residence with the humans in Japan. Nomamoto, a factory worker with an abusive alien boss, one day meets Kitami, who tells her his own family was killed by aliens. The two quickly forge a friendship, but one day Kitami does the unthinkable…
description.id: Setelah menyelamatkan Bumi, para alien tinggal bersama manusia di Jepang. Nomamoto, seorang pekerja pabrik dengan bos alien yang kejam, suatu hari bertemu dengan Kitami, yang mengatakan bahwa keluarganya sendiri dibunuh oleh alien. Keduanya dengan cepat menjalin persahabatan, tetapi suatu hari Kitami melakukan hal yang tidak terpikirkan...
description.ja: <毎週月曜更新>宇宙人が地球を救ってから、人間と宇宙人が共に住むようになった日本。工場で宇宙人の上司にこき使われるノマモトは、家族を宇宙人に殺されたという北見と出会う。仲を深める2人だが、ある日北見がとんでもないことをしてしまい…
description.ru: Пришельцы спасли Землю и обосновались с людьми в Японии. Номамото, работающая на фабрике с отвратительным боссом-пришельцем, однажды встречает Китами, который рассказывает ей, что семью его убили пришельцы. Между ними быстро возникает дружба, но однажды Китами совершает немыслимое...
description.uk: Після порятунку Землі прибульцями, Японія стала спільним домом для них та людей. Номото, яка змушена терпіти знущання від свого боса-прибульця на заводі, зустрічає Кітамі, чиє серце розбите втратою сім'ї, вбитої прибульцями. Між ними виникає щира дружба, яка переходить до здійснення їх бажань... винищення всіх прибульців...
description.pt-br: Após salvar a Terra, os alienígenas passaram a viver com os humanos no Japão. Nomamoto, uma operária de fábrica com um chefe alienígena abusivo, um dia conhece Kitami, que conta que sua própria família foi morta por alienígenas. Os dois rapidamente formam uma amizade, mas um dia Kitami faz o impensável…

altTitles.zh-hk: 即使分開也仍舊喜歡的人

altTitles.zh: 即使分开也仍旧喜欢的人

description.ja: 「ひさびさなんだから、藍ちゃんをもっと堪能させて？」30歳を目前に芸人を辞め、家を出て行った元カレ・葉介と半年ぶりに再会した藍。細身のスーツに見知らぬメガネをかけた、デキるサラリーマン風の葉介に、藍は女の影を感じて悪態をついてしまう。離れていた時間が長いほど想いは募って……？　同棲カップルの元サヤ恋愛は照れ隠し。再会、復縁からの溺愛なるか!?

altTitles.ja: 左ききのエレン

description.en:
A mediocrity and a genius. Although distressed by the limits of his own abilities, Asakura Koichi still dreams of "making it big" in the near future. Meanwhile, Yamagishi Eren is dealing with the agony and solitude of being called a genius due to her overwhelming artistic talent. After their fateful encounter during senior high school, Koichi becomes a designer for a major ad company while Eren is working as an artist in New York. It's their individual setbacks in life that leads them to discover their true self.  
  
[Original Web Comic](https://cakes.mu/posts/12577)  
[Live Action Drama Series](https://www.mbs.jp/eren_drama/)

altTitles.ja: 真夏のスピカ

description.en: 100 Short Manga about Types of and Behavior in Yuri Relationships

title.en: Kono Ai wo Owarasete kurenai ka

altTitles.ja: この愛を終わらせてくれないか
Kono Ai o Owarasete kurenai ka

altTitles.zh: 能让这份爱画上休止符吗

altTitles.vi: Chấm dứt tình yêu này đi được không?

description.en: Yuzu is Hayami Madoka's ardent fan. Having no friends or family that care for her, Madoka is her only solace. Being that Sachiko is Madoka's best friend, she is Yuzu's most hated existence. To vent, she opens a secret account where she posts malicious comments about Sachiko. When she discovers this, she instead attempts to befriend Yuzu and offers her a chance to talk to Madoka. However, an accident occurs and they end up switching bodies with Sachiko being left in coma.
description.vi:
Hachikawa Yuzu, một nữ sinh cấp 3 với cuộc đời học đường ảm đạm có một bí mật. Rằng thực chất cô ấy là một người hâm mộ cuồng nhiệt của Hayami Madoka, bạn cùng lớp và cũng là một nữ diễn viên nổi tiếng.
Yuzu, ngưỡng mộ và tôn sùng Madoka như một nữ thần, cảm thấy hạnh phúc khi chỉ đơn giản được học cùng lớp và nhìn ngắm Madoka mỗi ngày.
Lẽ ra chỉ như thế đã đủ, nhưng cho tới một ngày...
Một câu chuyện tình yêu méo mó nhưng đồng thời cũng vô cùng thuần khiết.

altTitles.ja: クイズ! 正義の選択

description.en: New challengers will challenge the popular variety program “Quiz! Choice of Justice” presented by the video distribution service “Justice” tonight! Do you get "5 million yen for entrepreneurship" or lose your "left arm"? Each decision to be tested on unanswered questions.

altTitles.ja: ダンス・ダンス・ダンスール

description.en:
Junpei is happily snoozing away during his sister's ballet recital when a male ballet dancer steps onto the stage. Moved by the strength and skills the dancer displays, the boy discovers his love for this art.  
  
But after a certain tragedy happens, he vows to leave his past behind and turn into the epitome of manliness. What will he do when his love for ballet reignites?!

title.en: My Roommate Is the Great Old Ones

altTitles.th: รูมเมทของฉัน ดันเป็นเทพบรรพกาล……

altTitles.ja: 冒険者ギルドの万能アドバイザー

description.en: Red is an ex-adventurer who was once the driving force in managing his party. He took care of all the busywork, such as dealing with guild requests and supplies for their adventures. Eventually, the hero declared that he was useless in battle and forcefully expelled him from the party. Having everything taken away from him, he spent his time frequenting a guild's tavern. Eventually, a young adventurer who was in trouble was saved by Red, and she begged him to take her on as an apprentice. As time went on, he realized that he had potential in training adventurers. He decided that his true calling was to be a teacher! This is a story about a jack of all trades instructor and his versatile students that will eventually become legendary adventurers who will take down the Demon King.

altTitles.ja: 最強の王様、二度目の人生は何をする？

altTitles.es-la: La Vida Después de la Muerte

description.de:
In einer Welt regiert durch die stärksten Kämpfer ist König Grey der unangefochten Stärkste, Reichste und Berühmteste. Aber eine solche Macht kommt Hand in Hand mit Einsamkeit. Unter der glamourösen Erscheinung eines mächtigen Königs liegt die leere Hülle eines Mannes, beraubt von Ziel und Willen.

Nach einer Wiedergeburt in eine Welt voller Magie und Monster hat der König die Möglichkeit, sein Leben erneut zu leben. Die Fehler seiner Vergangenheit zu korrigieren wird aber nicht seine einzige Herausforderung sein. Unter dem Frieden und Reichtum dieser neuen Welt lauert etwas, das alles vernichten kann, was er jemals erreicht hat, was seine Rolle darin und den Grund für seine Wiedergeburt in Frage stellt.
description.en:
King Grey has unrivaled strength, wealth, and prestige in a world governed by martial ability. However, solitude lingers closely behind those with great power. Beneath the glamorous exterior of a powerful king lurks the shell of man, devoid of purpose and will.

Reincarnated into a new world filled with magic and monsters, the king has a second chance to relive his life. Correcting the mistakes of his past will not be his only challenge, however. Underneath the peace and prosperity of the new world is an undercurrent threatening to destroy everything he has worked for, questioning his role and reason for being born again.
description.fr:
Le Roi Grey a une force, une richesse et un prestige inégalés dans un monde gouverné par l'aptitude martiale. Cependant, la solitude s'approche de près derrière ceux ayant de grands pouvoirs. Sous l'apparence glamour d'un Roi puissant se cache la carapace de l'homme, dépourvue de volonté et de but.

Réincarné dans un nouveau monde rempli de monstres et de magie, le Roi a une seconde chance de revivre sa vie. Cependant, corriger les erreurs de sa précédente vie ne sera pas sa seule tâche. Sous la paix et la prospérité de ce nouveau monde se cache une menace sous-jacente remettant en question tout ce pour quoi il a travaillé, son rôle, et sa raison de renaître.
description.ja: 私は史上最強の「王」である。数多の敵を退け、数々の功績を残した歴代最高の覇王だ。 しかし、ある朝目覚めた私は奇妙な違和感を覚える。手足が短い、視界が極端に低い、見知らぬ男女が私を「アーサー」と呼び、微笑みながら覗き込む。そう…私は無力な赤子に転生してしまったのだ！最強の王様がいたいけな赤ちゃんに転生する、痛快冒険ファンタジー‼
description.pl:
Król Gray ma niezrównaną siłę, bogactwo i prestiż w świecie rządzonym przez umiejętności walki. Jednak samotność pozostaje tuż za tymi, którzy mają wielką moc. Pod olśniewającą powierzchownością potężnego króla kryje się skorupa człowieka, pozbawionego celu i woli.

Wskrzeszony w nowym świecie wypełnionym magią i potworami, król ma drugą szansę na ponowne przeżycie swojego życia. Jednak naprawienie błędów przeszłości nie będzie jego jedynym wyzwaniem. Pod pokojem i dobrobytem nowego świata kryje się ukryty nurt, który grozi zniszczeniem wszystkiego, na co pracował, kwestionując jego rolę i powód narodzin na nowo.
description.ru: Король Грей обладает непревзойденной силой, богатством и престижем в мире, во главе которого стоит боевая мощь. Однако одиночество обычно появляется именно у тех, кто обладает большой властью. Мало кто знает, но под гламурной внешностью могущественного короля скрывается оболочка человека, лишённого цели и воли.
description.pt-br:
Dizem que a solidão acompanha aqueles com grande poder. Permanecendo como um Rei com força incomparável, status, e fama… e muito mais. Eu, que uma vez lutei para viver, me afogava em meu raso trono sem nenhuma vontade ou propósito. Haviam muitos que tinham inveja de mim, mas eu diria de bom grado, “Tirem tudo de mim! Será meu presente!” Um dia, eu finalmente consegui meu presente – uma nova vida.

Com uma segunda chance de corrigir meus erros e cumprir meus arrependimentos, permita-me mostrar a você o que um (ex-rei) pode fazer!

description.en: After falling into the sea and going missing, Woo Young-jang returns to civilization after spending 7 years on a deserted island! His body has become firm and muscular, he can now communicate with all sorts of animals and even employ their special abilities. However, incidents and accidents seem to follow him wherever he goes. Will Young-jang be able to survive in the city, which is said to be even more terrifying than the jungle?
description.ko:
바다에 빠져 실종된 후, 무인도에서 7년 만에 살아 돌아온 우영장의 좌충우돌 문명 적응기!
그의 몸은 단단한 근육질로 변했고 온갖 동물과의 의사소통은 물론, 특별한 능력까지 구사하며 사건사고가 끊이질 않는다.
과연 영장은 밀림보다 무섭다는 도시에서 살아남을 수 있을까?

altTitles.ja: ボクを知りたすぎる清水さん

altTitles.en: Shimizu-san who wants to know me too much

description.en:
Atago Gato is a shy and reclusive high school boy. One day, while preparing for the school festival, a cute and cheerful classmate named Shimizu Roman finds out that he is aiming to become a manga artist. Isn't that amazing? The popular girl, who seems to live in a different world from him, takes an interest in him and asks him a lot of questions he never expected! When he confesses a traumatic experience after being criticized on SNS... Shimizu-san tries to help him overcome it in a slightly strange way...? A youthful romantic comedy in which a cheerful girl and a gloomy boy struggle to make manga!

(Source: AniList)
description.es: Atago Gato es un chico de instituto tímido y solitario. Un día, mientras se prepara para el festival escolar, una simpática y alegre compañera de clase llamada Shimizu Roman descubre que aspira a convertirse en dibujante de manga. ¿No es increíble? La chica popular, que parece vivir en un mundo distinto al suyo, se interesa por él y le hace un montón de preguntas que no esperaba. Cuando confiesa una experiencia traumática tras ser criticado en SNS... Shimizu-san intenta ayudarle a superarlo de una forma un tanto extraña...? ¡Una comedia romántica juvenil en la que una chica alegre y un chico sombrío luchan por hacer manga!
description.id:
Atago Gato adalah anak SMA yang pemalu dan tertutup. Suatu hari, saat mempersiapkan festival sekolah, teman sekelasnya yang lucu dan ceria bernama Shimizu Roman mengetahui bahwa dia bercita-cita menjadi seorang seniman manga. Bukankah itu luar biasa? Gadis populer, yang sepertinya hidup di dunia yang berbeda darinya, menaruh minat padanya dan menanyakan banyak pertanyaan yang tidak pernah dia duga! Saat dia mengakui pengalaman traumatis setelah dikritik di SNS... Shimizu-san mencoba membantunya mengatasinya dengan cara yang sedikit aneh...?
Sebuah komedi romantis masa muda di mana seorang gadis ceria dan seorang anak laki-laki muram berjuang untuk membuat manga!
description.ja: 陰キャで引っ込み思案の高校生・愛宕画人（あたごがくと）。ある日、文化祭の準備中に陽キャで可愛すぎる女子高生・清水ろまんに『マンガ家を目指している』ことがバレてしまう。「めっちゃスゴくない！？」住む世界が違うカノジョから興味を持たれて、まさかの質問攻め！？ SNSで批判されたトラウマを告白すると…清水さんは、ちょっぴりカゲキな方法で克服させようとしてきて――？　陽キャな女子と陰キャな男子がマンガ作りに奮闘する青春ラブコメ！

altTitles.vi: Tụi mình không có hẹn hò

description.en:
“Why do you keep asking if we’re dating? We’re just holding hands, we’re not dating!!”
It’s a slice-of-life romantic comedy about couples who aren’t really couples!
description.id:
Sebuah karya baru dari author Webtoon Character Na Kang Lim

“Kenapa kamu terus tanya kalau kita pacaran? Kita cuma bergandengan tangan, kita nggak pacaran!!”
description.pt-br:
"Por que você continua perguntando se estamos namorando? Só estamos de mãos dadas, não estamos namorando!!"
É uma comédia romântica slice-of-life sobre casais que não são realmente casais!

altTitles.ja: 幼女無双
幼女無双 ～仲間に裏切られた召喚師、魔族の幼女になって【英霊召喚】で溺愛スローライフを送る～

altTitles.ja-ro: Youjo Musou: Nakama ni Uragirareta Shoukanshi, Mazoku no Oujo ni Natte "Eirei Shoukan" de Dekiai Slow Life wo Okuru

altTitles.en: Unparalleled Little Girl: A Summoner Betrayed by Friends, Become a Demon Little Girl, and Live a Doting Slow Life with "Summoning of the Spirits"

description.en: Lilith, the summoner who accompanied the hero party, was betrayed during the battle with the demons and suffered a serious injury because she refused the invitation of the hero. Helped by her demons, she cannot return to the country in a detour, so she decides to become a demon at the recommendation of Astaroth, the four demon kings who helped her. However, she made a slight mistake and she turned into a little girl. Even if she becomes a little girl, her magical power is not the same, but powers up! Summon the spirits and make an outstanding performance in battle and slow life!
